```{python}
import yaml
from IPython.display import display, Markdown, HTML
from string import Template

def make_person_description(name, attrs):
    s = """
        <html>
            <style>
                .container {
                    display: flex;
                    align-items: center;
                    justify-content: center;
                }

                .image-container {
                    flex-shrink: 0;
                    width: 150px;
                    margin-right: 20px;
                    display: flex;
                    flex-direction: column;
                    align-items: center;
                }

                img {
                    max-width: 100%;
                    max-height: 100%;
                }

                .text {
                    flex: 1;
                    display: flex;
                    align-items: center;
                    padding: 10px;
                    margin-bottom: 40px;
                }

                .caption {
                    text-align: center;
                    font-style: italic;
                    margin-top: 10px;
                }
            </style>
            <body>
                <div class="container">
                    <div class="image-container">
                        <img src="$picture">
                        <div class="caption">$name</div>
                    </div>
                    <div class="text">
                        $description
                    </div>
                </div>
            </body>
            <br>
        </html>
    """
    template = Template(s)
    return template.substitute(
        picture=attrs["picture"],
        description=attrs["description"],
        name=name,
    )


yaml_data = yaml.safe_load(open("people.yml"))

positions = {
    "Permanent researchers": "permanent",
    "Research engineers": "engineer",
    "Postdocs": "postdoc",
    "PhD students": "phd"
}

for long_pos, short_pos in positions.items():
    display(Markdown(f"## {long_pos}"))
    for name, attrs in yaml_data.items():
        if attrs["position"] == short_pos:
            display(HTML(make_person_description(name, attrs)))
```
